dataList.name: Amplitude Entanglement
dataList.desc:
- Fuses the effects of the Tremor type added by Amplitude Entanglement and the Tremor type currently on target together under Tremor - Superposition.
- Potency and Count values do not change over Entanglement.
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion on Tremor - Superposition, it activates as Amplitude Entanglement instead.
- Turn End: converted into base Tremor.

dataList.name: Tremor - Superposition
dataList.desc:
- Gained through Amplitude Entanglement
- When triggering Amplitude Conversion, add the effects of the resulting Tremor type to the list of active Tremor effects under Tremor - Superposition.

dataList.name: Tremor - Distribution
dataList.desc:
- Turn End: Gain ((sum of all allies' Tremor Count) / (# of surviving allies)) Offense Level Up next turn (max 5)
- When hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: T Corp. Special Investigator Badge
dataList.desc:
-When this unit takes lethal damage, their HP does not drop below 1, instantly heals 80% of their max HP, and recovers from Stagger. (Once per Encounter)
- When this buff effect activates, starting next turn, this unit gains 2 Attack Power Up at every Turn Start for 5 turns.

dataList.name: Tremor - Chain
dataList.desc:
- Lose 1 Clash Power for every 10 Tremor Potency on self (max 3)
- When Hit by Skills that trigger Tremor Burst, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect's Potency
- Turn End: reduce the Count by 1
- (Interacts the same way as normal Tremor does to effects that raise or reduce Tremor Potency/Count)

dataList.name: T Corp. Borrowed Time
dataList.desc:
Turn End:
- Gain (Borrowed Time Count - 1) Haste, Clash Power Up, and Fragile next turn.
- At 1 Count, gain (2 x (Borrowed Time Stack - 1) Bind next turn instead.
- Gain 1 Stack and lose 1 Count
- If this unit has more Bind than it has Haste, the Borrowed Time effect expires and this unit gets Staggered.

dataList.name: Time Delay
dataList.desc:
As long as this effect is active, damage dealt against this unit is stored and not taken.
Turn End: reduce value by 1
Turn End: If there is only 1 value left of this effect, the effect expires after dealing (2 x stored damage) Sloth damage to this unit
When this effect is active, its value cannot be gained or be refreshed.

dataList.name: Clash Power Down
dataList.desc: In a Clash, lose Clash Power equal to the value

dataList.name: Clash Power Up
dataList.desc: In a Clash, gain Clash Power equal to the value
dataList.summary: In a Clash, gain Clash Power equal to the value

dataList.name: Stolen Time
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: At 200+ value, gain (value - 200)/50 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 200 value, gain (200 - value)/50 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

dataList.name: Shared Time
dataList.desc:
- Turn Start: At 40+ value, gain (value - 40)/10 Offense Level Up & Defense Level Up.
- Turn Start: At less than 40 value, gain (40 - value)/10 Offense Level Down & Defense Level Down.

dataList.name: Joint Time Expenditure
dataList.desc: When spending Shared Time, the Brains spend an equal amount of time across the board.

dataList.name: Infighting
dataList.desc:
When spending Shared Time, the Brains no longer spend an equal amount of time across the board.
Turn Start: all parts lose Protection equal to the number of Parts with different remaining Time values.

dataList.name: Time Acceleration
dataList.desc:
- Gain 5 Speed
- Enhances this unit's Skills.
- Gain 1 Fragile; when Tremor Burst, Skill or Coin effect raises this unit's Stagger Threshold, it raises it by +50% more.

dataList.name: Broken Unity
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
Gain 1 Fragile. Gain 1 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

dataList.name: Broken Unity
dataList.desc:
- Panic
Gain 2 Fragile. Gain 2 Tremor Count when hit. (3 times max)

dataList.name: Time Rescue Target
dataList.desc: Targeted by the Time Ripper while Time Acceleration is active.

dataList.name: Microprecision Time Acceleration
dataList.desc:
This unit gains base Min and Max Speed by Stack
Skills that inflict Tremor Potency, Count, or trigger Tremor Burst: gain Base Power +(Stack), deal +(Stack x 10)% damage against enemies, and when raising Stagger Thresholds via Tremor Burst, increase the amount raised by (Stack x 10)% (including E.G.O Skills)
Reduced by 1 at Turn End
At 1 Stack, the Stack does not drop below 0, and is maintained through the Encounter.
